name: Digimon Adventure
description: Digimon Adventure is a Japanese anime series about a group of children who are transported to the Digital World where they meet creatures known as Digimons.

name: Digimon Adventure 02
description: The second season of Digimon Adventure, following the adventures of new DigiDestined kids.

name: Digimon Tamers
description: The third season, where Digimons are real creatures that appear in the human world.

name: Digimon Frontier
description: Digimon Frontier follows a group of children who are chosen to become DigiDestined and travel to the Digital World where they transform into Digimons themselves.

name: Digimon Data Squad
description: Digimon Data Squad focuses on a new group of DigiDestined children, and their battle against evil Digimons using the help of a new organization.

name: Digimon Fusion
description: Digimon Fusion tells the story of a boy who becomes a DigiDestined in the Digital World, where he can fuse Digimons together to form powerful creatures.

name: Digimon Adventure tri.
description: Digimon Adventure tri. is a series of six movies that continues the story of the original DigiDestined and their Digimons as they grow older and face new challenges.

name: Digimon Adventure 02: The Movie
description: The movie takes place after the events of the Digimon Adventure 02 series and continues the adventures of the DigiDestined.
